Section.SectionTitle: CONCURRENT IJ~XICAIJZEI) I)EI)ENI)ENCY PARSING: THE ParseTalk MODEL
Section.Paragraph: Norbert Br6keh Udo Hahn & Susanne Schacht Abstract. A grammar ,nodel for concurrent, object-oriented natural language l)arsing is introduced. Complete lexical distribution of grmnmatical knowledge is achieved huilding upon the head-oriented notions of valency and dependency, while inheritance mechanisms tire uscd to capture lexic;tl generalizations. The underlying concurrent computation m(xlel relies upon the actor l)aradigm. We consider message passing protocols for establishing del)cndency relations and amhiguity handling.
